Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: AI's feedback was more spelling and grammar based. It didn't really try to correct my description of concepts and if it did I ignored it. Teacher feedback enabled me to learn more from the assignment and carry it over into other assessments.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Negative feedback from the teacher is taken more personally because it comes from an actual person. AI feedback is easier to ignore.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teacher feedback (on an assignment) can sometimes be shorter (they have other papers to mark) but zoom in on the relevant parts of the assignment where I lost marks, AI feedback gives more general and broad insight.
